name: It's All In Your Head (FlamingIceCubeGames)
description:
Welcome to the strange lands in a fractured mind. Explore 4 large areas with plenty of NPC's and surreal imagery. 

You are the Cloaked One, a strange creature that is humanoid. He is in search of 5 Flesh Tokens to open a Flesh Gate so that he may find out what lies beyond. The less you know, the better.

Check the README included for credits and controls.
